short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension closes all open tabs in the current window, leaving a single tab in place for future reference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Too many open tabs bogging you down, but can't afford to lose everything you have open? This extension is a one-click solution. 

Click the Salvage button to clear all open pages in your current Chrome window. In a single new tab, it will preserve URLs to every page you had open. This allows easy future reference in a concise format. You can also take notes on this new Salvage page. If you use Salvage when you have a Salvage page already open, it will collapse all tabs while preserving the existing links on the Salvage page. 

Use Salvage to close tabs and eliminate clutter without losing your pages!
